name: Feint
shortContent: Make an opposed WP test against your opponent. If you win, your next attack against them cannot be Dodged or Parried.
content:
The character attempts to use guile and combat training to
trick his opponent into a mistake. The character and his target
make an Opposed Weapon Skill Test. If the active character
wins, his next melee attack against that same target cannot
be Dodged or Parried. If the active character's next Action
is anything other than a Standard Attack, the advantage of
Feinting is lost.
